newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Forexbank busy on otherwise quiet Estonian market.
newsitem.headline: Forexbank busy on otherwise quiet Estonian market.

text.p: Shares in Forexbank were the most active on the Estonian stock exchange on Wednesday, with the rest of the market staying fairly quiet, dealers said.
Forexbank turnover was 3.02 million kroons but its shares were barely changed at 77.20 kroons versus 77.30 kroons.
"It was just a few orders coming into the market at the same time, it was nothing in particular," said one dealer of Forexbank's activity.
Overall stock exchange turnover on the main list was 4.57 million kroons and the Tallinn stock exchange index moved fractionally lower, ending 0.01 percent down at 96.02.
On the secondary free market, investors showed fair interest in the Norma plastics company.
It had turnover of 1.49 million kroons and its shares dipped to end at 20.35 kroons from 20.40 kroons.
Overall free market turnover was 2.25 million kroons.
